message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer on it?
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate your enthusiasm, $250 is a bit out of my budget for this product. I'm willing to pay $100 for it. Let me know what you think.
I understand that $100 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can do $180, which is a good compromise. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $180 is still a bit high for me. I'm happy to go up to $120. If you're not willing to go lower, I'll unfortunately have to look elsewhere.

I'm not willing to go as low as $120, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous offer. I can do $190, which is a bit higher than your last offer, but still a good compromise. What do you think?
